pages.text: Easily recognized by their spotted coats, Dalmatians were originally bred as both hunting and guard dogs.$(br2)Standing at just under a block tall, these fierce and loyal dogs come in four different spot patterns.
These dogs are most commonly found in savanna biomes. They can also be found, in varying rarities, in windswept biomes.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Rabbit or Bacon Treat.
